title: Input lag when it comes to mouse clicks and camera movement
body: I just bought a brand new laptop about 3 weeks ago and i haven't been able to play League from purchase because of this crazy input lag. My ping stays at a solid 55 as i have it connected with ethernet on my 1 gig internet so i know it's not that. My fps averages about 380, but when i click or move my camera it takes a couple miliseconds to register. You buy a new laptop expecting to get a better gaming experience, but it was the opposite. I'm not sure what to do. I don't need input to help derank me to bronze, i already have that under control myself.

replies.body: This has been happening for over a week now.  Its on the PBE too.
Can you possibly provide a quick recording of what you're seeing? There could be a few things going on and seeing it should clear up what's going on.
